_sText:
The Idea was to make a remake of aurantia-grisea! But then we made a realy nice remake with many extra tool! ;)

Have Fun & Good Luck

Please download it and load it on each server you know!
Thank you

Sry the other Pics dont work -.-

Changes:

1. Stage 2 Spawn: Added invisible wall (no camping)

2. Stage 3: Railbug fixed

3. Jail: 30 sec opentimer

4. No Shortcuts anymore

5. New Bonus (by Shoop)

6. Bonus 2 Teleporter (Above Jail)

6.1. The first Button:  You kan Kill all Players

6.2. The second Button: You can teleport all Players to a mini gg map

6.3. The third Button: Freedom!

6.4. The Buttons works only in Jail!!

7. After 4 Minutes you will teleport to a battle map (aim_ag_texturecity_advanced)

8. The fall damage has been deleted

9. Jail: Clock added

10. Have Fun by surfing the aurentia-grisea_remake
